function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid increase in positive cases due to initial allowance of outdoor activities leading to stricter restrictions.","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare system, increased infection rates, and higher risk of disease spread.","Mitigation":"Implement strict limitations on outdoor activities, enforce social distancing, and discourage public gatherings.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, remote monitoring technologies, and public health communication tools.","People":"General public, individuals exercising outdoors, and those participating in public gatherings.","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, and local law enforcement."},{"Description":"Dramatic increase in positive cases leading to strict limitations on outdoor activities and public spaces.","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare system, increased infection rates, and higher risk of disease spread.","Mitigation":"Enforce strict limitations on outdoor activities, promote essential activities, and discourage public gatherings.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, remote monitoring technologies, and public health communication tools.","People":"General public, individuals using public spaces, and those participating in public gatherings.","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, and local law enforcement."},{"Description":"Allowance of outdoor activities with warnings to keep distance and avoid gatherings leading to prolonged restrictions and increased monitoring.","Impact":"Potential for continued infections, difficulty in enforcing distancing, and risk of non-compliance with guidelines.","Mitigation":"Strongly enforce distancing guidelines, use public awareness campaigns, and increase monitoring of outdoor activities.","Technologies":"Surveillance technologies, remote monitoring solutions, and public health communication tools.","People":"General public, individuals engaging in outdoor activities, and those not complying with social distancing guidelines.","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, and local law enforcement."}]}
